list.description:
#sight #m26 #m26pershing #m26_pershing #m_26 #m_26_pershing #semihistorical #semi_historical
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated & fixed distance font scale bug]
Remember this M26 gunsight I requested all the way back in March?
Now I already got enough sight coding knowledge to make it by myself

Here, keys for distance adjusting don't actually elevate or depress the gun. Instead, they move with the central X and horizontal ines. As it moves up and down, the lines aligns with the distance lines of the individual shells (and MG)

Illuminated sight is turquoise...

A pretty simple universal sight I threw together for MBTs in mind (but it works on any tank) to get a clean sight picture and make acquiring targets a bit easier. Colors can be changed in the blk file, but I chose green and red for a good contrast in normal sights and thermals. #mbt #universal


Edit: Sight is now fixed. I play on mac and apparently, whenever I use the tab key it makes a null character that messes the sight up. I have fixed it and reuploaded. Big thanks to IrresponsibleDad for helping me resolve this. Hope you enjoy!

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #leopard #leopard1 #leopard_1 #ww2related
[UPDATE 17/11/2021 - misalignments fixed]
Radial gunsight for the Leopard 1. Styled in german WWII sights *A Bridge Too Far Moment* because those are indeed good-looking

The small arc sets distance for HESH, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM502-HESH" text
The medium arc sets distance for HEATFS, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM12-HEATFS" text
The big arc sets distance for APDS, currently set distance is displayed below the "DM13-APDS" text
Coaxial (and top-mounted) ...

a #Stadimetric sight for the #m103. the top square is for the rangefinder estimate and the bottom one is for the detect allies one. The distance correction changes whit ammo type just like the base game. I would change this to have both this and the heat displayed nicely but it is impossible at this point because Gaijin (same issue with the t54E1).

Semi-historical universal gunsights of all countries


2025.8.8 A great update.

Optimizing all gunsights, and add JP 75+mm, SW 37mm & 75mm, USSR tkn, FR HEAT


This is a collection of all countries AFVs universal gunsights.

They are semi-historical, simple & functional.

Enjoy them !
​

#sight #universal #historical #kv #is2 #t34 #t44 #t54 #is3 #is4 #m3 #m4 #m26 #t32 #2pdr #17pdr #20pdr #type3 #type4 #type97 #semovente #m13 #m41 #m43 #amx #amx50 #lorraine #tiger #tiger_ii #tiger_h1 #panther #panzer #stug #panzerjager #ztz99 #ztz96 #ztz#strv

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #amx_30 #amx30 #amx_30_super #amx30super #request #sightrequest #requested
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions in french & now can be illuminated, font scale bug fixed]
The same gunsight I did recently for the Leopard 2PL, now adjusted to fit the AMX-30 Super
Requested by @SIRLINK

#sight #m4a1 #m4a1_fl10 #m4a1_fl_10 #m4a1fl10 #m4a1fl_10
[UPDATE 09/10/2021 - inscriptions can now be illuminated]
Gunsight for the M4A1 Sherman FL10. Tried to make the most bizzare, yet eye-pleasing (maybe not eye-pleasing, but not awkward to look at) sight, to match how bizarre is the FL10 Sherman (atleast when it comes to looks). And I think I've kinda succeeeded, haven't I?

The inner aiming cross spins around when adjusting distance (360° spin takes approximately 3900 meters difference)
Also, see those two groups of 6 circles upwards? They represent the FL10's autoloader, and ...

#sight #semihistorical #semi_historical #leopard #leopard2pl #leopard_2pl #leopard_2_pl
[UPDATE 28/05/2022 - fixed misalignments]
The most successful gunsight of mine so far, finally fixed. All there was to fix was the arrow pointing at distance lines and the distance correction in bottom-left corner

Distance fire system : Linear
Supported ammunition : Any
Rangerfinder : in-game
FOV Shrinked : no
Gunsight illumination : Bright green

#help the coax for the #amx30 series seem to be broke for the premiums with the 12.7mm and the 20mm is not listed in the wiki.
If anybody knows what the fix for this is that would be great, thanks.

#sight #is3 #is_3
Gunsight for the IS-3. Tried to combine the style of Soviet WWII and postwar gunsights, and a fine crosshair because...it looks cool on tanks

The gunsight is variable, automatically adapts to velocity of the shell that is chosen to be loaded

Sights for IS-3, IS-4M, IS-6 for simulator battles.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

If you would like to know how sim sights work, visit this:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

#t723b3 #t80bvm #essa #ussr #ussr_tank #t54 #t55 #t62 #t64 #t72 #t80 #t90 #bmp #bmp_1 #bmp_2 #bmp_3 #pt76 #sight #universal #historical #tpn

Remaking, 2024.9.9

I made two kinds of historical sights which are the USSR armored vehicles in Cold
War. They are easy to understand.
这两种瞄具是本人制作的苏联冷战装甲车辆历史瞄具。简单易懂。

tpn_universal_sight.blk - the TPN series night gunner sights for all the USSR
armored vehicles equipped with infrared night vision systems.
“tpn_universal_sight.blk”是苏联 TPN 系列夜间炮镜，适用于苏联所有装备红外夜视
仪的战车。

essa_universal_sight - the ESSA thermal imaging system equip...

Simple Allpurpose Sight
This is not strictly general purpose as it was made for myself (for Swedish tanks).
It can also be used for tanks in other countries.
You can change the size, color, etc. of the scale by editing the blk file.

【TSxxx】
TS・・・TakenoSight
xxx・・・Modelname

【lineup】
TST_250・・・250m Distance tank gun sight
TST_500・・・500m Distance tank gun sight
TST_50・・・50m Distance tank gun (howitzer) sight
TSR・・・rocket sight ※U-SH 405
TSM・・・missile sight
TSAA・・・AA sight
TSAA_R・・・radarAA sight

Sight for Leopard 2 PL for simulator battles. With a simple trajectory for APFSDS (both DM33 and DM43) up to 500 meters.

See more (including a collection of my sights and how to change colour for the sight) here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

...

Realistic sight Jungner OPS 1 for STRV 103 (0, A and C).

You can use with standard view or gunner's view. Use telemetry in gunner's view for compensate the parralaxe.

Contains folder and fil for:
-STRV 103-0
-STRV 103 A
-STRV 103C

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/installer-un-viseur-personalise/3448

#sight #realistic #strv #strv103

#help I was updating my sights for my leo's when I noticed that the HE-VT DM11 on the #leopard2pl #leopard shell was broken. I tried to fix it but it seems that the HE-VT shell type is not specified in the article https://wiki.warthunder.com/index.php?title=User-made_sighting_reticles and if anybody knows this it would be great thank you!

Universal fictional modern sight with X crosshair built for modern tanks and SPAAs. Best working for M1128.


#sight
A sight for the M1128 "Stryker" MGS. There are minute of angle marks at 4, 8, and 12.

Sight for M36 GMC, (Chinese) M36 and Super Hellcat for simulator battles. Features APCBC.

All my sim sights can be found here:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/979176/en/

See more sim sights (and how to use them) there:
https://live.warthunder.com/post/971966/en/

Версия прицела, содержащая все виды снарядов, поддерживаемых самой техников. Данный пак поддерживает: КВ-1 (Л-11), КВ-1 (ЗИС-5), КВ-1С, Т-34 (1940) или по-другому Т-34 (1941 Л-11), Т-34 (1941), Т-34 (1942), Т-34 (СТЗ), Т-34Э, КВ-220, СУ-76М. Надеюсь, вам понравится. Приятного пользования!
#sight
#historical
#ussr_t_34_1940_l_11
#ussr_t_34_1941

#ussr_kv_1_zis_5
#ussr_kv_1s

#help I am currently trying to make a sight for the #t54e1, however, the APBC shell type is non-functional or some information on the stat card for the shell is incorrect. I have tried bulletType:t= "apbc_tank, ap_large_caliber_tank", "apc_tank, apcbc_tank", and "ap_tank" @ speed:r= 1067 but none work. If anybody knows please let me know :)

Добрейшего вечерочка! Реалистичные прицелы для техники Т-34-85 (Д-5Т), КВ-85, СУ-85 вас уже ждут. Позже список обновится. Ну а пока вот.
#sight
#historical
#ussr_t_34_85_d_5t
#ussr_su_85_1943
#ussr_kv_85

Добрейшего времени суток Давно хотел сделать этот прицел, хотя особого смысла в этом не видел, так как его уже кто только не сделал :) Но я как фанат того времени техники и всего такого, был обязан сделать его. В архиве пак прицельных сеток, дабы было быстрее установить, нужно просто перекинуть в корень игры папку их архива "UserSights". Удачи на полях сражений!

Обновлено:

Добавлена надпись "76-М62"

Добавлены три машины, поддерживаемые данный прицел на снаряд М62:
Т20
M18 GMC
M18 "Black Cat"

<block...

Добрый день, вечер, утро, ночь! Прицел был взят из другой игры, другого автора, но я думаю, он не обидется. Прицельная сетка является универсальной для любого вида техники, но для более лучшего и удобного отображения объясняю: первая прицельная сетка "SwedeSight" - для техники с оптикой, подобной Т-34, где прицел заметно приближает. Вторая прицельная сетка "SwedeSight1"- для техники с оптикой, подобной Т-34-85, где прицел почти не изменяется в кратности. Ну, а на этом всё!
Оригинал был взят отсюда: https://wotsite.net/pritsely/12489-pritsel-shvedskij-swedish-dlya-world-of-tanks.html
